plot: Raimundo, a hired gun with serious illness is hired to kill Grace, a whore who has moved to Sao Paulo to hide from her son's father. Their destinies cross inside a peep-show stall, giving rise to a romance which unfolds on a razor's edge.
title: O Príncipe Encantado
plot_es: Raimundo, a hired gun with serious illness is hired to kill Grace, a whore who has moved to Sao Paulo to hide from her son's father. Their destinies cross inside a peep-show stall, giving rise to a romance which unfolds on a razor's edge.
plot_en: Raimundo, a hired gun with serious illness is hired to kill Grace, a whore who has moved to Sao Paulo to hide from her son's father. Their destinies cross inside a peep-show stall, giving rise to a romance which unfolds on a razor's edge.
